Tariff.A2: UNLIMITED Local+STD Home + Roaming voice calls on Vi network+3000 Local+STD Home/Roam SMS+ 140 GB 4G/3G/2G data- validity 1 bill cycle
Tariff.A18: Family 1149 N is a family Primary Plan with 4 FREE Add-On connection (Free Add-On connection will need to be on Family Member Plan 249 (Rental 249) plan, rental for which will be deviated to '0' during billing) Family Member Plan 249 plan will be available only as add-on plan to Primary Plan and billing responsibility for any other usage will be with the primary Family 1149 N subscriber
Tariff.A131: For usage above 3000 SMS in a bill cycle; Rs 1/SMS for Local Rs 1.5/SMS for National Rs 0.25/SMS for National Roaming Local Rs 0.38/SMS for National Roaming STD continue to be applicable.
Tariff.A135: Standard ISD rates apply. For standard rates, visit https://www.myvi.in/POSTPAID/isd-call-rates
Tariff.A161: For voice in Home and or Roam : Customer calls to more than 300 Unique numbers (mobile and/or Landline and STD calls) in consecutive 7 days in a bill cycle, AND Cumulative duration of Incoming calls <15 minutes in consecutive 7 days in a bill cycle. If the customer usage is deemed to be commercial as per above condition, then any usage beyond 5000 minutes will be charged at 50p/min. For SMS in Home and or Roaming : For usage above 3000 SMS in a bill cycle; Rs 1/SMS for Lcoal Rs 1.5/SMS for National Rs 0.25/SMS for National Roaming Lcoal Rs 0.38/SMS for National Roaming STD For Data : Data usage by any Individual subscriber on GSM Postpaid plan with UNLIMITED DATA & Voice benefits having data usage greater than 150 GB along with voice usage less than 50 minutes (including incoming calls) in a bill cycle will be termed as commercial/Non-Retail usage of Data. Any subscriber with commercial/non-retail data usage as defined above will be termed as Commercial/non-retail Data User. Such identiifed subscribers's unlimited data plan would be modified and assigned nearest (lower rental) limited data retail plan available in market without giving any prior notice. Any plan exit clause (if applicable) will be applicable to all such subscribers.
Tariff.A239: 3000 Local, National while in Home and National Roaming on Vi Network
Tariff.A266: Free subscription to Vi Movies and TV for 12 months
Tariff.A268: Digital/Misc benefits need to be availed through Vi Android/ios App;
Tariff.A270: MyVi Website, Vi app, Vi Store, call centre
Tariff.A273: Family Member Plan 249 (rental Rs 249) will be deviated to '0' rental only when associated with the Primary member (Primary member must be on Family 1299 plan) during billing; A subscriber willing to be on Family 1299 plan without add-on will continue to be on the Family 1299 plan and pay full rental for same
